name: Rune Hunters
description:
Rune Hunters is my first top-down game so it may contain a lot of bugs (I haven't created a save/load system so the money is infinite but you can try to beat this game with no upgrades:)

Just Extract and Hit the .exe file to Play!

If the game receives attention, I may update it regularly but for now I don't have much plan for further development of it.

Hope everyone will enjoy it!
